section.body: Before you ask Reality is a stupid bullshit game. Your planet is dead and there's nothing you can do about it. And you just got on the train to watch your friends die. You're welcome. Fuck shipping.
Extremely.

section.header: Question: Why should I even keep going?
section.body: Because they want to watch you die, fuck them. Also if you succeed you get to escape the bullshit, but that's secondary.

section.header: Question: Are you sure they want me to die?
section.body: It's that or they want to watch you fuck your friends/ecto siblings, but you spread hate so it's win/win on the spite train.

section.header: Question: Wait my friends are my siblings
section.body: Yes, It's such a shitty twist, we know. We all go through it.

section.header: Question: So I'm thinking about giving up

Person who talks about free will too much and acts too little. Also responsible for all this bullshit. Also a snarky asshole. Also a robot. Also a small tiny robot who enjoys death.

section.body: Ignore them. If they're talking about shipping, punch. Repeat as needed.

section.header: Question: The Time player is talking.
section.body: Listen. If they're whining about dead selves, direct them towards blood player. If a blood player doesn't exist, and you can't get into the session customizer, deliver punches as necessary.
Fight with their aspect, if your knight is breath or life all the better.
Start kinda pansy, but grow to be pretty badass based on aspect quickly.

Either whining pitifully in a corner because they don't know what to do, or setting everything up for your victory. Just, leave em be.

section.header: Umm... I just got punched into a wall... And I feel... Fine. What's going on?
section.body: Well, that means, congrats! You're probably not going to die to easily! That's a good thing! And if you're a Blood or Rage player.... Well that's just plain normal, nothing to be worried about.

section.body: SHENANIGANS.
